Song.title: The Highest Glory
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Mark Altrogge © 1996 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [| F2 | C | C | C | C | F2 | F2 | C | C F2]
Verse: The [C]highest glory, the richest praise The [C]deepest worship in the highest place [F]Be to You, Lord It all belongs to [C | C F |]You The [C]greatest honors that we can bring The [Am7]sweetest anthems that we can sing [F2]Be to You, Lord It all belongs to [C]You.
Bridge: [G]You were the [Bb6]One who was [G]Willing to [F2]lay down Your [C | Dm Bb2 |]life [G]Taking our [Bb6]sin, You were [G]humbled And [F]emptied and [Eb]died, that is [G]why
Chorus: Your [F]name is far above all [G]names Be[F]fore You every knee will [G]bow [F]You’ve received the highest [G]glory [F | F | C | C F | C]now!
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse the highest glory the richest praise the deepest worship in the highest place be to you lord it all belongs to you the greatest honors that we can bring the sweetest anthems that we can sing be to you lord it all belongs to you bridge you were the one who was willing to lay down your life taking our sin you were humbled and emptied and died that is why chorus your name is far above all names before you every knee will bow youve received the highest glory now
